name: Grabbing Master

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Grabbing Drag, Grabbing Style, Improved Grapple; base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th.

sections.text: When you are grabbing two opponents while using Grabbing Style, you can use your grapple to move or damage both opponents you are grappling, instead of just one.
sections.name: Benefits

prerequisites: Grabbing Drag, Grabbing Style, Improved Grapple
base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th
description: You can grapple two foes as easily as one.
